description: A 16-year-old ninja in the Kairoushuu who uses the Iga`s hijutsu forbidden technique "Kira". This technique shoots the user`s ki into the body of a target and controls it from the inside out, which can cause the target`s bones to break or their body to completely explode. The cost of using this technique is the loss of the user`s life force, gradually losing their five senses and eventually dying.
name: Yoite
